name: SPECIAL MEAT for a special boy
name_original: SPECIAL MEAT for a special boy
description:
While working part-time at a local store the CULT sends you a letter telling you to take care of its special pet, do NOT let it die. You can get the monster’s food by buying it from your computer OR chopping people up… just don’t kill the whole village.

FROM: CULT 

the monster has been placed in the back room and we left some meat in the vent, if you bought more you will find it there, just throw the food and he will grab it.

THE CULT HAS ITS EYES ON YOU.

CONTROLS: Movement (WASD) Crouching (LEFT CTRL) Picking up (E for left) (Q for right) Using (LEFT MOUSE for left) (RIGHT MOUSE for right) Interacting (F)

(UPDATED FIX)
The COMPUTER can now be interacted with properly (it didn't work)
FIXED the game CRASHING on some old PCs when feeding the MONSTER
FIXED boxes getting stuck in the VENT

(there are minor typos sorry about those... it was the CULT's fault not mine)

IMPORTANT
(the SPECIAL MEAT boxes spawn in the vent on the opposite side of the monster's room,  they are only spawned after interacting with the Computer or pressing the BUY button when in register mode)

Want a challenge?, make it past 05:00 (or you can't?)
